title: Coronavirus: First case of virus in New Zealand
first-para: The first case of coronavirus has been confirmed in New Zealand. Authorities are now scrambling to track down people who may have come into contact with the patient.

title: Coronavirus: Jacinda Ardern urges calm as panicked shoppers empty supermarket shelves
first-para: Panicked shoppers have forced the closure of a major food wholesaler on Saturday and today despite the Prime Minister urging New Zealanders to go about their daily lives after the country's first case of coronavirus.

title: Coronavirus: Rest homes and retirement villages plead for national aged care response plan
first-para: The aged care sector is urgently asking health authorities to coordinate a national response to the coronavirus threat.

first-para: Australia has recorded its first coronavirus fatality as a man confirmed as Covid-19 positive has died in a Perth hospital.

title: Coronavirus: What's the difference between a pandemic,an epidemic and an outbreak?
first-para: The coronavirus is on everyone's minds. As an epidemiologist,I find it interesting to hear people using technical terms – like quarantine or super spreader or reproductive number – that my colleagues and I use in our work every day.

title: Coronavirus: Jacinda Ardern expects further 'tough' travel restrictions in NZ

first-para: making it hard to sift reliable news from the noise."

title: Coronavirus: Self-isolation now a legal condition for foreigners entering New Zealand

title: As virus shuts down cities in Europe, pollution drops

title: Covid 19 coronavirus: Photos from a century of epidemics
first-para: There are times when the planet resets its course with a cruelty that seems as capricious as it is implacable. The coronavirus pandemic, spreading octopus tentacles into every crevice of society, is one of them, pitting the vanity of human assumptions against nature's almost casual ability to destroy them. It is not the first time.

title: Covid 19 coronavirus: Best household cleaning products to combat virus
first-para: COVID-19 has only been around for a few months, so at this point scientists don't know that much about it. But more is being learned every day. We now know, for example, it can live on surfaces for up to nine days and survives in the air for a few hours. We also now know that the virus particles are shed through saliva and fluids coughed up from the lungs. And that the virus can also be shed from our faeces.

title: Covid 19 coronavirus: Sufferer recounts brutal battle with virus

title: Covid-19 coronavirus: Taliban movement touts its response to pandemic

title: Covid 19 coronavirus: NZ's elimination strategy has united a nation. Can that unity outlast lockdown?

title: Former PM John Key praises Christopher Luxon as National leader Simon Bridges faces backlash
first-para: Former Prime Minister John Key has praised National Party candidate Christopher Luxon, in a video released hours after party leader Simon Bridges was accused of ""politicising"" the lockdown."

title: Covid-19 coronavirus: Dogs could be used at airports to detect infection
first-para: Sniffer dogs could be trained to screen airport passengers arriving in Britain, experts have said.

title: Covid 19 coronavirus: Preventable drownings up, but surf life saving rescues down
first-para: New Zealand drowning numbers might be up, but cooler ocean temperatures and the Covid-19 lockdown also led to a 20 per cent drop in rescues this season, Surf Life Saving NZ says.

title: NZ Defence Force personnel navigate Anzac Day 2020 in a world isolated by Covid-19
first-para: I've been ​deployed to Observer Group Lebanon for three months so far. My role is that of a United Nations Military Observer (UNMO).

title: Coronavirus: Repatriation flights blocked by local action in Ecuador
first-para: Protest and local government action is stopping flights from landing at one of Ecuador's busiest airports.

title: Coronavirus Covid-19: Duke and Duchess of Cambridge clap for health workers with George, Charlotte and Louis
first-para: William and Kate have stepped out with their three children to show their support for frontline health workers.

title: Covid 19 coronavirus: CNN host Anderson Cooper breaks down speaking to virus widow
first-para: CNN TV presenter Anderson Cooper spoke to Katie Coelho yesterday about her husband who had recently died from coronavirus.

title: Covid 19 coronavirus Level 3 childcare rules: Sandpits closed, parents told to wait in cars
first-para: Sandpits will stay closed when most childcare centres and schools reopen this week.

title: Calls to poison hotlines increase after Donald Trump's disinfectant comments
first-para: Two days after US president Donald Trump suggested the possibility of injecting disinfectant to fight the Covid-19 virus, Maryland's outbreak hotline has received more than 100 calls regarding bleach as a cure, while poisonings from household cleaners have doubled in New York.

title: Covid 19: Donald Trump cancels coronavirus briefings, says they're 'not worth the effort'
first-para: President Donald Trump on Saturday cancelled his near-nightly Covid-19 press conference, instead tweeting that the briefings are "not worth the time and effort".

title: Covid 19 coronavirus: Contact tracing system still in development as full lockdown ends
first-para: The public health system is now said to be operating the promised "gold standard" contact tracing and testing system promised a week ago, even though key elements of it remain in development.

title: Covid 19 coronavirus: Bob Scott Retirement Village residents unite despite social distancing
first-para: Residents of the Bob Scott Retirement Village, in Lower Hutt, have shown how you don't need to stop socialising, even if you have to do it from afar.

title: Surfing under Lever3
first-para: Surfers in Whanganui finally got back onto the water at the North Mole after New Zealand moved into Level 3 due to the lockdown and the Covid-19 coronavirus.

title: Covid-19 coronavirus: Demand for pulse oximeters to soar despite doubts over usefulness
first-para: British healthcare manufacturers are preparing for a rush of people looking to get hold of a £20 ($41) device that might help to identify the early signs of coronavirus.

title: Covid 19 coronavirus: Couple kept apart by border restrictions
first-para: Iranian woman Mersedeh Shabanzadeh turns 33 today and had planned to celebrate her birthday with her husband in New Zealand.

title: Covid 19 coronavirus: Donald Trump takes no responsibility after spike in disinfectant calls
first-para: Calls to poison control and emergency hotlines in a number of US have spiked in the days since President Donald Trump mused about injecting disinfectant into the body to wipe out Covid-19.

title: Covid-19 coronavirus: Closure of some bars signals move to toughen rules on distancing
first-para: Stockholm authorities have ordered five pubs and restaurants to close for breaking social distancing rules, in the first sign of a stricter approach to coronavirus control in Sweden.

title: Covid-19 coronavirus: US moves closer to testing international air travellers
first-para: United States President Donald Trump said his Administration is considering requiring travellers on certain incoming international flights to undergo temperature and virus checks to help stop the spread of the coronavirus.

title: Covid-19 coronavirus: San Francisco's HIV experience may have saved lives now
first-para: With just over three minutes left on the clock, Kansas City Chiefs' 27-year-old running back Damien Williams scored a highly contested touchdown to put his team in the lead over the San Francisco 49ers in February's Super Bowl.

title: Covid-19 coronavirus: China lashes out at Australian PM as diplomatic tensions escalate
first-para: China has lashed out at Scott Morrison as deserving 'a slap in the face' for trying to blame the Covid-19 pandemic on the communist state, warning any push for an independent inquiry into the virus' origins will spark a travel and trade boycott.

title: Covid-19 coronavirus: Riots in crisis-hit Lebanon reflect growing poverty, despair
first-para: Hundreds of protesters in Lebanon's northern city of Tripoli set fire today to two banks and hurled stones at soldiers who responded with tear gas and batons in renewed clashes triggered by an economic crisis spiraling out of control amid a weeks-long virus lockdown.

title: Coronavirus: First death in New Zealand from Covid-19
first-para: Dr Ashley Bloomfield and Prime Minister Jacinda Ardern have confirmed a person has died with Covid-19 in New Zealand.

title: Rugby league: New Zealand Warriors still hopeful of NRL restart - but big issues still need to be solved
first-para: The Warriors still hope to leave for Australia this Sunday, despite the ongoing uncertainty over the proposed NRL restart on May 28.

title: Coronavirus Covid-19: Charmed star Holly Marie Combs slams President Donald Trump over grandfather's death
first-para: Actress Holly Marie Combs has hit out at US President Donald Trump as she grieves her grandfather's death from coronavirus complications.

title: Covid-19 coronavirus: Musk tweets 'Free America Now' as lockdowns halt Tesla production
first-para: Tesla boss Elon Musk has criticised the coronavirus lockdowns and suggested that restrictions should be lifted, tweeting a call to "Free America now".

title: Covid-19 coronavirus: Obese people hospitalised 40 per cent more likely to die, study finds
first-para: Obese people hospitalised with coronavirus are almost 40 per cent more likely to die than slimmer patients, the first major study of such cases in Britain has found.

title: Covid19 coronavirus: Global cases hit 3.1 million, death toll at 60,000 in US,26,000 in UK
first-para: More than 26,000 people have died from coronavirus in the United Kingdom, National Health Service figures show - a jump of almost a fifth on previous reports.

title: Covid 19 coronavirus: Virus was 'not man-made' - US Intelligence confirms
first-para: The US intelligence community has concluded that the novel coronavirus gripping the globe originated in China but was not man-made or engineered.

title: Covid 19 coronavirus: Piers Morgan tested for virus after feeling unwell
first-para: Controversial British journalist Piers Morgan is taking time off from hosting his breakfast show while he waits for the results of a coronavirus test.

title: Covid 19 coronavirus: Virus-afflicted 2020 looks like 1918 despite science's march
first-para: Despite a century's progress in science, 2020 is looking a lot like 1918

title: Covid 19 coronavirus: 'No distancing' at Waitakere Hospital where nurses infected says visitor
first-para: A visitor to a hospital ward where Covid-19 patients were treated by nurses who became infected themselves says the lack of physical distancing between staff was surprising.

title: Covid 19 coronavirus: Ashley Bloomfield and other health experts face questions from MPs
first-para: There were tears and a flood of emotions at the Epidemic Response Committee this morning, as members of the public shared their heartbreaking stories of suffering during lockdown.

title: Hastings set to lead the way for NZ's real estate market post Covid-19
first-para: Experts say Hastings' housing market could lead the way for a regional NZ real estate bounce back after the Covid-19 pandemic.

title: Covid-19 coronavirus: Suspended, disqualified drivers may have to wait till level 2 for licence to be reinstated
first-para: Motorists whose suspension or disqualification from driving ended during the Covid-19 lockdown may have to wait till the country goes down to level 2 to get their licence reinstated.

title: Covid 19 coronavirus: 309 tourism jobs slashed at Ngāi Tahu
first-para: The number of employees at Ngāi Tahu will be slashed by 309.

title: Covid 19 coronavirus: What you need to know about Thursday's big developments
first-para: The Government has revealed what life will be like for New Zealanders at alert level 2, as confidence grows that the country is on track for the move next week. Get all the important news and read the full stories in the links below.

title: Covid 19 coronavirus: What will real estate look like at level 2?
first-para: Looking to buy or sell real estate at level 2? Prepare for physical distancing, contact tracing and lots of cleaning.

title: Covid-19 coronavirus: Most universities won't reopen until July
first-para: Most universities will still not reopen until July even though the Government says they can start again from the Monday after the country moves down to alert level 2.

title: Covid 19 coronavirus: Kiwi mum on the heartbreak of losing her baby in lockdown
first-para: A Tauranga mum, who asked not to be identified, says she wishes there had been different protocols to allow her family to meet and grieve the loss of one of their own.
